content.title: Add Action to TextBox Widget
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, expand Components > userEntry.emailField > emailField and select the txtEmailID textbox.
  2. From the upper-right corner of Iris, in the Properties panel, click Action, then click Edit for the onDone event.
    The Action Editor window appears.
  3. From the Action Editor left menu, under Function, select Invoke Function.
  4. From the right pane of the Action Editor, under Function Name, select the onTextEdit function.
  5. Click Save.
